Phoebe Notes Extension – The ultimate tool for seamless note-taking while you browse the web. With a simple click, you can instantly jot down important information, research insights, useful links, or anything else that matters to you—all without interrupting your workflow.

Perfect for professionals who need to track ideas on the go, or college students organizing research, Phoebe Notes keeps everything stored securely on your computer. No cloud, no databases—just fast, private note-taking that stays local.

Stay productive. Stay organized. Make note-taking as effortless as browsing.
